tool_description: Finds listings from finnish c2c websites Tori and Huuto by searching with search terms
title: Huuto.net & Tori.fi item finder

api_list.name: Huuto.net and tori.fi query
api_list.description: Huuto.net and tori.fi query with chosen searchterm
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://huuto-net-tori-fi-item-finder.p.rapidapi.com/kaikki/{searchterm}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "huuto-net-tori-fi-item-finder.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
